TopicTitle: Having MechJeb and Flight Engineer activated by default

Articles.Content:
I already asked this question in the Facebook group, but maybe you guys (here on the forum) have any tips or solutions.

What I want to do is to make sure that MechJeb and Flight Engineer always are activated without you needing to add the Flight computer all the time. I only want the numbers, nothing else.

In the Facebook thread someone said that Flight Engineer has a partless mode to turn on somewhere. I can't find it though. Someone also linked to the MechJeb and Engineer for all! mod. Unfortunately this only works for crafts that includes a probe core or a command module. Is it possible to also show the numbers for ships counted as debris? Maybe I could reference MechJeb and Flight Engineer in every part I have, would that work? If so, is there any way to do it all in all go using regex or something?

Thanks,

Instresu

It's in the KER settings (in the VAB, right hand button). Press Partless instead of Career for, well, partless mode. This enables it for anything - including debris (at least, if I'm remembering it correctly, it should).

If you add it to every part, it'd lag your system a lot (I found that out by accident).
